title: Shipper 360
description: Shipper360 provides a range of services for merchants, including shipping, fulfillment, warehousing, omnichannel solutions, and a wallet for payment management.
contribution: Spearheaded the design and implementation of comprehensive shipping, fulfillment, and warehousing solutions tailored to the specific needs of merchants.
Led the development of innovative omnichannel strategies to streamline the customer experience and drive sales growth across multiple channels.
Orchestrated the integration of Shipper360's wallet system into the payment management infrastructure, ensuring seamless and secure transactions for merchants.
Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to align technology solutions with business objectives and drive continuous improvement initiatives.
Acted as a strategic advisor to merchants, providing insights and recommendations on leveraging Shipper360's services to optimize operations and achieve their business goals.

title: Shipper Dashboard
description: Shipper Dashboard facilitates domestic and international shipping for merchants, alongside a wallet for order payments and commission disbursements.
contribution: Played a pivotal role in the development and maintenance of Shipper Dashboard, a robust platform enabling merchants to manage domestic and international shipping seamlessly.
Led the implementation of key features within the dashboard, focusing on enhancing user experience, scalability, and performance.
Engineered the integration of a wallet system into the dashboard, allowing merchants to conveniently handle order payments and commission disbursements.
Collaborated closely with product managers, designers, and fellow engineers to translate business requirements into technical solutions, ensuring alignment with Shipper's goals and objectives.
Conducted code reviews, provided technical guidance, and contributed to the continuous improvement of development processes and best practices within the team.

title: Shipper HQ
description: ShipperHQ aids agents in processing domestic and international orders for merchants and non-merchants. It includes a wallet for order payments and commission disbursement.
contribution: Led the frontend development efforts, focusing on crafting an intuitive and visually captivating user interface for the project.
Implemented a variety of features aimed at enhancing user engagement, including personalized learning paths and interactive exercises, to create a dynamic and immersive learning experience.
Worked closely with the backend team to establish clear communication and ensure seamless integration of frontend components with the backend infrastructure.
Leveraged expertise in frontend technologies and best practices to optimize performance, usability, and accessibility of the application.

Actively participated in design discussions, provided valuable insights, and collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions that met project requirements and exceeded user expectations.

Collaborated with the backend team to ensure seamless integration of frontend components.

title: AvidX - Practice

title: Froyanesia
description: Froyanesia stands as a pioneering digital marketplace tailored for the buying and selling of fresh chicken, providing a convenient and reliable platform for enthusiasts of fresh chicken.

title: Esusmart
description: Esusmart represents a groundbreaking venture into the digital realm of neighborhood convenience, serving as a dedicated online marketplace for the modern "kelontong" or mini mart. This web platform redefines the traditional shopping experience by bringing the corner store to the fingertips of users, offering a diverse range of everyday essentials in a seamless and user-friendly digital environment.

title: Bimi
description: Bimi is a web profile project stands as a digital gateway to the world of Bimi, a distinguished mining company. This online platform provides a comprehensive overview of Bimi's operations, values, and contributions to the mining industry. Through thoughtful design and informative content, the web profile showcases Bimi's commitment to excellence in the field of mining

title: Doolen
description: Doolen emerges as a cutting-edge online marketplace designed to revolutionize the way we buy and sell fresh produce, fruits, seafood, and daily essentials. Serving as a digital marketplace for everyday needs, Doolen connects consumers with a diverse range of high-quality, locally sourced products, offering a seamless and convenient solution for modern-day grocery shopping.
